95625.name: Estimated literacy rates (Buringh and Van Zanden (2009))
95625.description: Estimate of the proportion of people who are literate. The year 1451 refers to the period 1451-1500, while years 1501, 1601, and 1701 represent the century.
95625.datasetName: Estimated historical literacy rates - Buringh and Van Zanden (2009)

source.name: Buringh and Van Zanden (2009)
source.dataPublishedBy: Buringh, E. and Van Zanden, J.L., 2009. Charting the “Rise of the West”: Manuscripts and Printed Books in Europe, a long-term Perspective from the Sixth through Eighteenth Centuries. The Journal of Economic History, 69(2), pp.409-445.
source.additionalInfo: See Table 9 (pg 434) for the original estimates.
